sub_title: Getting Pharma Noticed by Creating Experiences HCPs and Patients Care About |  Product & Service Development | Marketing | Content | Health Care
summary:
Curious about how to stand out as a Pharma company and create experiences with maximum visibility, increased lead generation and business growth? Get in touch; I love to share my stories and learn from others. 

𝗔𝗕𝗢𝗨𝗧 𝗠𝗘 
Live in 🇳🇱 but work across the 🌎. I love to play 🎹, mix 🎧 Deep House tunes and 🏃🏽to stay in shape. Family and friends are what matter in life!  

𝗘𝗫𝗣𝗘𝗥𝗧𝗜𝗦𝗘 & 𝗞𝗡𝗢𝗪𝗟𝗘𝗗𝗚𝗘 
I created my first application when I was eight years old on the 🕹 Commodore 64—since then always been involved in developing digital products and services that make people's lives more enjoyable, convenient and practical. 

What I do:
‣ Design digital strategies for Pharma; 
‣ Build solid digital marketing foundations (integrated website, e-mail marketing, social marketing, physical sales & content marketing)
‣ Create and launch digital products & services (patient support programs, digital marketing experiences) 
‣ Manage Digital Marketing tactics execution (campaigns, landing pages, podcasts, vlogging, apps)

𝗠𝗬 𝗩𝗜𝗘𝗪 𝗢𝗡 𝗛𝗘𝗔𝗟𝗧𝗛 𝗖𝗔𝗥𝗘 𝗠𝗔𝗥𝗞𝗘𝗧𝗜𝗡𝗚
Creating impact is easy when you truly understand your audience's challenges. Involving HCPs and patients from the start means (business) impact from the start.

‣ Successful marketing teams include all employees (sales, marketing, medical, regulatory and legal)
‣ Technology enables (sometimes low tech means higher impact) 
‣ Regulation & Legal is fun (yes, it demands creativity, but there is so much more possible than we think)
‣ Data speaks louder than opinions (and data without context is worse than opinions 🤓)

𝗖𝗢𝗡𝗧𝗔𝗖𝗧 𝗠𝗘
✉️ Send me a LinkedIn message 

𝗦𝗣𝗘𝗖𝗜𝗔𝗟𝗧𝗜𝗘𝗦
Digital Marketing | Product & Service Development | Data-Driven Marketing | Customer Engagement | Business Modelling
